Name: Spiky Shield
Effect: Target Self. Reaction 3. Shield Move. Reduce 3 Damage this Pokemon would receive from a Damaging Move. If the Foe used a non-ranged Physical Move. Roll 2 Dice of Typeless Damage against it, ignore defenses.
Description: The Pokemon covers itself with a thorn filled shell, the foe will be damaged if it hits directly into it.
